REM CONFIG CRC IS 2E0C
HW_RESET_I2C,00,
SLEEP,00,2000,
NCI_CORE_RESET,00,
NCI_CORE_INIT,0000,
SLEEP,00,200
REM RESET THE CUSTOMER FIELD
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,040006010008000000000000a5a5
SLEEP,00,200
REM HARDWARE CONFIGURATION
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,040002010024201204138803E804000505FF08020305C600000500000000000000000505530000000089
SLEEP,00,200
REM Writing CustomA RF Parameters
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,
REM Writing CustomB RF Parameters
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,040010010154C0598D8300040242040402420202103D3D3D3D3D3D3D3D2C2C2C00484800000000000000E00000000000000000000000404040E04040404040404091949444959595450000000000000000000000000000000000
REM Set DPC table
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000301004AA509F009390A7F0AC30A070B490B890BB70BB20BAF0BAF0BAE0BAD0BAD0BAD0B37098309CF09190ADF042B067506BF06090753079D07E80732087C08C6081009FF0FFF0FFF0FFFFFFF1F
SLEEP,00,200
REM UICC CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000A01001A48003C3C04B027100AF007D003E807D00064271003E832C81964
SLEEP,00,200
REM SE CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000B01001A40041E1E04B027100AF007D003E807D00064271003E832C81964
SLEEP,00,200
REM IOT CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,04000801000CDF01F7000000C1C3C3003D00
SLEEP,00,200
REM ANTENNA CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,0400090100200000E10BB801B5FFEC0000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000
SLEEP,00,200
REM NFCC CONFIG
NCI_DIRECT_CTRL,2F,02,0400010100050057000606
SLEEP,00,200
REM WRITE CONFIGURATION CRC IN THE CUSTOMER FIELD
NCI_SEND_PROP,0F,02,0400060100080000000000002E0C
SLEEP,00,200
HW_RESET_I2C,00,
SLEEP,00,2000,
NCI_CORE_RESET,00,
NCI_CORE_INIT,0000,
REM MATCHING ;53;4.5;89;Differential;Yes;15;560;No;No;ANT;1500;4.7;77;100;1500;77;DNP;150
REM CONFIGURATION ;1764.72222222222;978.718469829276;9.21362940616003;No;No;Differential;Yes;77;560;121;90;8.67386900925052;DNP;ANT;150;27;4.7;100;4.5
REM TOOL VERSION 3.02
